name: pomodori-task-tracker
description: Pomodori is an application that track your work progress based on Pomodori method. You will be working focusly each 25 minute, then take a break for 5 minutes. After every 4 pomodori, you take a longer break, usually 15 minutes (you can set yourself). Target for each wee may varies from 50-55 pomodori (6-10 each day).
author: Khanh H. Nguyen
